import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline


n,h,l,r = map(int,input().split())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))

dp = [[0] * h for _ in range(n+1)]

for i in range(1,n+1):
    for j in range(h):
        dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i-1][(j+a[i-1])%h])

        if l<=(j+a[i-1])%h<=r:
            dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j]+1)

print(max(dp[n]))

n,h,l,r = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

t = 0
c = 0
for i in range(n):
    t += a[i]
    if l <= t%h <= r:
        c += 1
print(c)


import heapq
import sys

n,h,l,r = map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
a = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))

dp = [[0] * h for _ in range(n+1)]

for i in range(1,n+1):
    for j in range(h):
        dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i-1][(j+a[i-1]-1)%h])

        if l<=(j+a[i-1]-1)%h<=r:
            dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j]+1)

print(max(dp[n]))

import sys

n,h,l,r = map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
a = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))

dp = [[0] * (h+1) for _ in range(n+1)]

for i in range(1,n+1):
    for j in range(h+1):
        dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i-1][(j+a[i-1])%h])

        if l<=(j+a[i-1])%(h+1)<=r:
            dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j]+1)

print(max(dp[n]))


from itertools import accumulate

N, H, L, R = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

t = [0] + list(accumulate(A))
t = [i % H for i in t]

c = 0
for i in range(N):
    if L <= t[i+1] <= R:
        c += 1
print(c)
